NAMESPACE_OSGEO_FDO_CONNECTIONS::IConnection* ConnectionManager::CreateConnection (  String *  providerName  ) 
 

Creates an unitialized connection object given the provider name.

Parameters:
providerName The unique name of the feature provider. This name should be of the form [Company].[Provider].[Version].
Returns:
Returns an instance of an FdoIConnection object. Throws an instance of FdoException * if an error occurs.
